unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyon! Needed more than ever, especially with unpredictable rains in Maharashtra. Heard stories of farmers near Nagpur losing everything on 15/07/2023. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana *seems* helpful, but getting claims sanctioned is a headache. Anyone had a good experience with SBI General Insurance recently? 02/08/2023 was the last date for Kharif crops, right? My neighbour Ramlal got only Rs. 2000 after waiting since 10:00 AM, 26/01/2023. Total joke. Need a better system!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyon! Needed more than ever, especially with unpredictable rains in Maharashtra. Heard stories of farmers near Nagpur losing everything on fifteenth July two thousand and twenty three. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana asterisk seems asterisk helpful, but getting claims sanctioned is a headache. Anyone had a good experience with S B I General Insurance recently? Second August two thousand and twenty three was the last date for Kharif crops, right? My neighbour Ramlal got only rupees two thousand after waiting since ten A M, twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three. Total joke. Need a better system!
